Posts.Content: Hi, advice needed please since its out of surgery hours. I have grade 3 cancer , mastectomy 3 weeks ago and full node clearance a week ago, Due to find out my treatment plan for chemo next week. My 9 year old daughter has come home from school and im certain its hand foot and mouth disease, should i be near her? Sorry if this sounds silly and thank you Gail
Posts.Title: just had mastectomy and full node clearance- daughter has hand foot...
